Topic.Title: Another Place to Host your game

Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone. I just wanted to see if anyone would be interested in having there game hosted on my website. Not saying just on my site but here and mine. Right now only HTML games will be on my server, but can link your Squify games.  Just like here you own the rights to your game.  Just a little more exposure for you and me. The site is still being worked on but almost ready. So if your interested let me know. Have a good one :)
Posts.HTML: Hi everyone. I just wanted to see if anyone would be interested in having there game hosted on my website. Not saying just on my site but here and mine. Right now only HTML games will be on my server, but can link your Squify games. Just like here you own the rights to your game. Just a little more exposure for you and me. The site is still being worked on but almost ready. So if your interested let me know. Have a good one :)

Posts.EditableText:
Sounds interesting having alternatives to post a game. However,  the most important question is the file size you are willing to host. 

Personally speaking,  I plan in future working on an Interactive comic book,  what would demand a larger file size than isual IFs.
Posts.HTML:
Sounds interesting having alternatives to post a game. However, the most important question is the file size you are willing to host.

Personally speaking, I plan in future working on an Interactive comic book, what would demand a larger file size than isual IFs.
